text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ec68028604b6ee799b2ef5fc861ec5163e82914f|patch 8.2.0961: MS-Windows: no completion for locales>
patch 8.2.0961: MS-Windows: no completion for locales

Problem:    MS-Windows: no completion for locales.
Solution:   Use the directories in $VIMRUNTIME/lang to complete locales.
            (Christian Brabandt, closes 36248)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0961: MS-Windows: no completion for locales · vim/vim@ec68028
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0961: MS-Windows: no completion for locales · vim/vim@ec68028
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: no completion for locales. Solution: Use the directories in $VIMRUNTIME/lang to complete locales. (Christian Brabandt, closes 36248)
